meta.title: From YANKEE to DOODLE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: One last dog breed-themed for the dog days of August. Except that doodle isn't a dog breed; rather it's a cross between a poodle and some other breed. You got your labradoodles, golden doodles, bernedoodles, schnoodles, and even corgipoos. Everyone wants to poodle. I guess this means poodles are the greatest breed. (And the greatest of them all is our 7-year-old standard, Cleo.)

ladder.clue: Add a letter to ^ to get a tech company
Anagram ^ to get a group of people
Drop a letter from ^ to get some relatives
^ is a broader term for your ___
Structure that might use to display your ^ in detail
Add a letter to ^ to get an organ in your body
Change one letter in ^ to get a sketch
